ProductInfo.Features:

<7> PD 52mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens +
<10> HB-45 Lens Hood + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
